post.body: Apparently @johndryan isn't a true believer! (or .. has a life!)
Is it ever.. UGH MY EYES
Did you ever come up with a good icon to represent a room, btw?
Might crash your lunch with John on Saturday?
My guess is that some base stations lock you out if you get the WPA2 password wrong too many times. Still horrible though.
Famous musicians (EG: Sting) teaching you how to play guitar? That's.. just.. amazing!
Looks like the hackers have @chockenberry's CHOCK LOCK http://www.macrumorslive.com/
Someone _hillarious_ is fucking with http://www.macrumorslive.com/ </sarcasm>
Does anyone seriously think that there'll be a web based iWork? Have you actually tried to use 280Slides for a serious presentation?
Is it sad that I'd be OK with: "Dear Apple Customer, You want everything we're about to announce. Your credit card has been charged."?
Fun playing with my new f/1.8 50mm lens! Thanks @johnlefebvre and @johnahern for your advice!
In Avoca. Terrified at the ratio of dudes to nondudes.
Is @prendio2 gone? Have a fantastic trip man. Looking forward to stalking you on Flickr / day516 !
The downside of the announcement is that if Jobs isn't totally obese by April, everyone will start reading Gizmodo again.
Good of them to leave out the best part too: "So now Iâ€™ve said more than I wanted to say, and all that I am going to say, about this."
I guess "Jobs admits that there was something wrong with him, confirms it to be none of your business." would be too long. Or accurate.
That BBC headline about Apple is just horrible.
Oh right, there's an election in Israel soon.
Are Israel getting this out of the way now because Obama won't be such a pushover about it..?
Webisode: A hastily put together, short, fan fiction quality, waste of time aiming to keeping you busy until the real shit is ready.
